name: employee-registry-api
description: This project is a fully functional API designed for managing employee records in a company, built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. The API showcases relational data handling in MongoDB using Mongoose and follows RESTful API design practices. The Employee Registry API manages employee information within a company, including personal data, roles, addresses, and office assignments. By establishing clear relationships between data models, this API provides a solid structure for handling company HR information..
